About me

I work with data systems often helping to build tools for data collection, analysis and reporting.
This is a personal project to share thoughts and to take notes on different tools that I will be using.
I mostly use Python in day-to-day data operations and extensively use pandas, numpy, geopandas,
and sklearn for data analysis and machine learning.
